dmca.title: copyright infrimgement
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Univoice Sales [mailto:sales@univoice.us] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 03, 2005 2:46 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: copyright infrimgement
Importance: Low


Dear Sir,
It came to our attention that one of your hosted members is running and
reselling
a pirated illegal copy of our software - UniVoice Pro - protected by the
United States
copyrights law. As set forth by the DMCA act of 1998, which may be found at
http://www.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf we bring this copyright
infringement complaint case to your attention. In order to protect you from
any legal liability we urge you to take necessary actions and/or remove any
illegal copy of our software from your network.
 
1. A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
The official owners of the software are: Mohamed Houssam and Ammar Kubba,
Esq.  of Los Angeles, California 
 
2. Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed,
or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a
single notification, a representative list of such works at that site.
 
The following site is hosting/running a copy of our software UniVoice Pro
ILLEGALLY on their server
(uniserver.exe) http://www.univoice.us/EULA.php

 
The site is:
stars-voice.com  70.85.76.153
http://www.stars-voice.com
 

3. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be
the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to
which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit
Ev1servers to locate the material.
 
We offer a voice chat server/client software.
The material is a form of .exe running on their server in addition to a
download (OCX) plug-in available on the above URL's with the name
univoice.ocx
 

4. Information reasonably sufficient to permit Ev1servers to contact the
complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if available,
an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be contacted.
 
Mohamed Houssam
310.753.9193
310.476.1528
 
11661 Montana Avenue Suite 7, Los Angeles, CA 90049
 
5.  A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that use
of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, it's agent, or the law.
 
The downloaded OCX has our code signing signature in it issues by THAWTE.com
(Verisign) as well as our copyrights and information in the server EXE about
as well
 
6.  A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
I hereby certify under penalty or perjury that the information provided
above is accurate and that I am authorized as one of the owners of UniVoice
(50%) to act on the behalf of UniVoice DBA.
